ink-color:hover{color:#00dcbb!important}.coronavirus-link-color:hover{color:#e24054!important}.homepage-btn-color,.news-btn-color,.politics-btn-color,.science_and_tech-btn-color,.sports_news-btn-color,.us_news-btn-color,.weather-btn-color,.world_news-btn-color{background-color:#39f}.homepage-btn-color:hover,.news-btn-color:hover,.politics-btn-color:hover,.science_and_tech-btn-color:hover,.sports_news-btn-color:hover,.us_news-btn-color:hover,.weather-btn-color:hover,.world_news-btn-color:hover{background-color:#5cadff}.celebrity-btn-color,.entertainment-btn-color,.movies-btn-color,.music-btn-color,.tv-btn-color{background-color:#f22d2d}.celebrity-btn-color:hover,.entertainment-btn-color:hover,.movies-btn-color:hover,.music-btn-color:hover,.tv-btn-color:hover{background-color:#f45353}.business-btn-color,.careers-btn-color,.finance-btn-color,.personal_finance-btn-color,.real_estate-btn-color,.retirement-btn-color{background-color:#16cef6}.business-btn-color:hover,.careers-btn-color:hover,.finance-btn-color:hover,.personal_finance-btn-color:hover,.real_estate-btn-color:hover,.retirement-btn-color:hover{background-color:#3dd6f8}.beauty-btn-color,.food-btn-color,.lifestyle-btn-color,.living-btn-color,.shop-btn-color,.style-btn-color,.travel-btn-color,.wellness-btn-color{background-color:#fb8585}.beauty-btn-color:hover,.food-btn-color:hover,.lifestyle-btn-color:hover,.living-btn-color:hover,.shop-btn-color:hover,.style-btn-color:hover,.travel-btn-color:hover,.wellness-btn-color:hover{background-color:#fcadad}.cars-btn-color{background-color:#00b398}.cars-btn-color:hover{background-color:#00dcbb}.coronavirus-btn-color{background-color:#d82138}.coronavirus-btn-color:hover{background-color:#e24054}.m-news{text-align:left;font-family:_Larsseit,Larsseit,Helvetica .glide__slide img,.m-weather.m-weather__channel .hours-wrapper .glide .glide__slides .glide__slide img{height:50px;margin:0 auto}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .days-wrapper .glide .glide__arrows [disabled],.m-weather.m-weather__channel .hours-wrapper .glide .glide__arrows [disabled]{opacity:.5}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .days-wrapper .glide .glide__arrows .glide__arrow,.m-weather.m-weather__channel .hours-wrapper .glide .glide__arrows .glide__arrow{background-color:#369af7;border:none;border-radius:20px;display:inherit;font-size:20px;font-weight:700;height:40px;width:40px;float:right;position:relative;margin-right:-40px;top:25px}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .days-wrapper .glide .glide__arrows .glide__arrow--next,.m-weather.m-weather__channel .hours-wrapper .glide .glide__arrows .glide__arrow--next{margin-right:20px;top:90px}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .days-wrapper .glide .glide__arrows .glide__arrow svg,.m-weather.m-weather__channel .hours-wrapper .glide .glide__arrows .glide__arrow svg{vertical-align:middle;top:12px;position:absolute}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .days-wrapper .glide .hideArrows,.m-weather.m-weather__channel .hours-wrapper .glide .hideArrows{display:none}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .dailyForecast.selected,.m-weather.m-weather__channel .hourlyForecast.selected{display:flex}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .video-wrapper{height:255px;left:auto;position:absolute;right:20px;top:65px;width:430px;bottom:-10px}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .video-wrapper .video-player{height:255px;width:430px;position:relative}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .hideVideo{opacity:0}@media screen and (max-width:768px){.m-weather__banner{margin-left:-10px;margin-right:-10px}}@media screen and (max-width:900px){.m-weather#m-weather__minimal .location-form__container{width:100%}.m-weather#m-weather__minimal .weather-details__container{padding-top:6px}.m-weather#m-weather__minimal .weather-details__day--icon{top:0}}@media screen and (max-width:1190px){.m-weather.m-weather__channel .weather-details-and-forecast .weather-details{text-align:center}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .weather-details-and-forecast .weather-details .weather-description{justify-content:center}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .weather-details-and-forecast .weather-details .sunset-sunrise{display:none}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .weather-details-and-forecast .forecast-switcher span{max-width:none;width:50%}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .weather-details-and-forecast .days-wrapper,.m-weather.m-weather__channel .weather-details-and-forecast .hours-wrapper{width:100%}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .weather-details-and-forecast .days-wrapper .glide .glide__arrows,.m-weather.m-weather__channel .weather-details-and-forecast .hours-wrapper .glide .glide__arrows{float:left;position:relative;left:10px}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .weather-details-and-forecast .days-wrapper .glide .glide__arrows .glide__arrow,.m-weather.m-weather__channel .weather-details-and-forecast .hours-wrapper .glide .glide__arrows .glide__arrow{top:15px}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .weather-details-and-forecast .days-wrapper .glide .glide__arrows .glide__arrow--next,.m-weather.m-weather__channel .weather-details-and-forecast .hours-wrapper .glide .glide__arrows .glide__arrow--next{left:45px}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .weather-details-and-forecast .dailyForecast.selected,.m-weather.m-weather__channel .weather-details-and-forecast .hourlyForecast.selected{display:inline-block}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .video-wrapper{height:240px;left:0;position:relative;right:0;margin:0 auto;top:30px;width:350px}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .video-wrapper .video-player{height:200px;width:350px}}@media screen and (max-width:480px){.m-weather.m-weather__channel .video-wrapper{width:100%;top:35px}.m-weather.m-weather__channel .video-wrapper .video-player{width:100%}}
